content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'demoDB')
    CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

-----

IF EXISTS ( SELECT type_desc, type FROM sys.procedures WHERE NAME = 'sp_trips_by_year' AND type = 'P')
    DROP PROCEDURE NYCTaxi.sp_trips_by_year
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE NYCTaxi.sp_trips_by_year @order_year INT
AS
BEGIN

    -- Drop the table if it already exists
    IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'NYCTripSmall_year' )
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTripSmall_year

    -----

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTaxi.NYCTripSmall_year
    WITH(
        LOCATION = 'lh-synapse-container/NYCTripSmall/sp/csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = myDataSourceManaged,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquetFileFormat
    )
    AS
    SELECT lpep_pickup_datetime, total_amount
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://lhadlsgen2storage.dfs.core.windows.net/lh-synapse-container/Data/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS source_data
    WHERE YEAR(lpep_pickup_datetime) = @order_year

END;
